long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daksha Recorder helps users to create YAML file hassle free for their application testing on Daksha. This will record user actions and on the basis of that, it will download a YAML file which can be used in open source tool "DAKSHA" for testing purposes.
(https://github.com/mykaarma/daksha)

HOW TO USE :
- Right click on the webpage where you want to start recording and click on "START DAKSHA RECORDER"
- All the functionalities are present in the Context Menu itself.

Functionalities:
- Start the recording 
- Pause and Resume
- Stop and Download YAML file.
- Stop and Copy to your clipboard.
